Fair Information Practices. Principles guiding data management for fairness, privacy, and security. Foundation for regulations but often not binding themselves.
First US articulation of FIPs. Established 5 principles: No secret records, Individual access, Limit secondary use, Correction rights, Data reliability.
Codified FIPs for federal agencies (not the private sector).
